website_summaries.verdict: Larger stick that gives older players the power they need to make tough shots.
pros: Stick has a good feel for controlling the ball
Stick is available in multiple larger sizes for older players, as well as multiple colors
Stick consists of carbon, Kevlar, and fiberglass materials
cons: Stick's design not advanced enough for high-end players seeking top quality

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size stick delivered- TWICE
customer_reviews.text: We just received the wrong size stick for the second time in a row. Returning it again. Season has started!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Just what my daughter was looking for. She loves the weight of the stick and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Knight

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this stick! Powerhouse.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stick! Good ccontrol and stick handling. Powerhouse stick
customer_reviews.author: Regina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great all around field hockey stick
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. I highly recommend this stick. My child's field hockey coach likes this model.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Geddes

customer_reviews.title: Fab stick
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her stick. She’s been playing for 5 years (since 3rd grade) and this is her first upgrade. She’s playing better and killing it on the field.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stick. Big difference in her drives
customer_reviews.author: Awesome but............

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: real good hockey stick... i changed from a Wood stick to this and can realy tell the difference... I was praised by it several times too and it real y Works well in any position
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Faraco

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to handle, perfect fit hs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this Stick! It’s strong and very easy to hold and manuvure
customer_reviews.author: deborah posner

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size set twice
customer_reviews.text: Twice I ordered a 34” stick and twice received 38”. Another reviewer had the same issue. Both returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need a little better quality and a little more longer
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Malik

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was the packaging I received it in. The tape was peeled off and the stock could have easily fallen out of the box. Other than that, I love my field hockey.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: The stick is too short. I leave Usa today ...
customer_reviews.text: The stick is too short. I leave Usa today and I don t know what I'm going to do. Martin
customer_reviews.author: Martin

product_meta.title: GRAYS GX1000 Field Hockey Stick
feature_bullets: Fully integrated Carbon, Aramid and Fiberglass composite
Fiberglass content ensures more forgiving ball control and shock absorption
Features Maxi Head and IFA to absorb initial ball contact
